title: Smart Home Setup & Security in {{city_upper}}, FL
headline: Make it smart without making it risky.
description: Professional setup and security for smart home devices in {{city_upper}}. We configure cameras, assistants, and automations with privacy-first, least-privilege access.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Many smart devices ship with insecure defaults like open services, universal plug-and-play (UPnP), or weak credentials.
Devices often send telemetry to cloud services by default. Least-privilege access and segmentation reduce exposure.
Poor access point placement, not just signal strength, causes dead zones and unreliable automations.

sections.heading: What We Set Do
paragraph: A secure, reliable smart home starts with clean configuration and the right boundaries.
items: Automations and routines that actually work

sections.heading: Security by Design
paragraph: We isolate untrusted devices, restrict cloud exposure where practical, and apply least-privilege access so one device can't compromise your whole network.

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We assess your goals and space, install and configure devices, and document everything so you stay in control, No subscriptions or vendor lock-in required.
